grammar: masc nom sg of saṅghādisesa, comp
meaning_lit: offence requiring involvement of the community from start to finish

sentence: yāvatatiyañ'ce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, icc'etaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, saṅghādiseso.
pali_1: [and if thosebhikkhus] being argued with up to three times, should relinquishthat [course], then this is good, [but] if they should not relinquish[it]: [this is a case concerning] the community in the beginning andin the rest [of the procedure].
